page.title: 12A day in my life by Debbie
page.content: My name is{Debbie Russell.}I am aged {10}and I live in{Pegsdon.}My mum wakes me at 0745. Downstairs I get a welcome from my dog. I make toast for breakfast. After breakfast I get dressed, I wash and brush my hair. I say goodbye to my mum and go to{Hexton {School}in a friends car. School starts at 0900 with maths, followed by spelling lessons, after which we have a break. Following break we read and write English. At midday we eat lunch and play until 1315. The afternoon begins with music until 1405 and then, in summer, we go swimming to Hitchin Pool. When I get home I watch television or play outside. For tea I usually eat sandwiches. After tea I watch television until it is bedtime at 20.15.
